duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and execute marine operations with a focus on offshore logistics from site of manufacture to staging port or site of installation offshore US East Coast.
Ensure alignment and co-ordination across all planned marine operation activities working closely with schedulers, contractors and subject matter experts.
Establish policies and procedures related to marine co-ordination functions during the construction of an offshore windfarm and identify value improvement.
Work closely with European based marine team, and mostly Europe based marine contractors.
Be the SBMT port logistics representative in WTG staging activities.
Be involved in establishing and operating the Marine Coordination center, and coordination during execution of the Empire Wind installation operations.
Be the Marine liaison with USCG, MWS and other NYC harbor operations.
Lead a team of engineering specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze offshore wind farm installation procedures and identify areas for improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's of Engineering (preferably in marine, civil, mechanical or other relevant engineering degree)
